CreateTable.document: This example shows you how to create a test table under the demo database.
CreateTable.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwdoris.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTable
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwdoris-bjizjxxx",
    "DbName": "demo",
    "TableName": "test",
    "KeysType": "AGG_KEY",
    "Columns": [
        {
            "Name": "user_id",
            "Type": "LARGEINT",
            "IsNull": false,
            "IsKey": true,
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": true,
            "Comment": "User ID"
        },
        {
            "Name": "date",
            "Type": "DATE",
            "IsNull": false,
            "IsKey": true,
            "IsPartition": true,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "Date and time of data writing"
        },
        {
            "Name": "city",
            "Type": "VARCHAR(20)",
            "IsNull": true,
            "IsKey": true,
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "User's city"
        },
        {
            "Name": "last_visit_date",
            "Type": "DATETIME",
            "AggType": "REPLACE",
            "IsNull": false,
            "DefaultValue": "1970-01-01 00:00:00",
            "IsKey": false,
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "User's last access time"
        },
        {
            "Name": "cost",
            "Type": "BIGINT",
            "AggType": "SUM",
            "IsNull": false,
            "DefaultValue": "0",
            "IsKey": false,
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "User's total consumption"
        }
    ],
    "Partition": {
        "AutoPartition": false,
        "PartitionType": "Range",
        "RangeInfos": [
            {
                "RangeType": "LESS THAN",
                "PartitionName": "0201",
                "Max": "(\"2017-02-01\")"
            },
            {
                "RangeType": "FIXED",
                "PartitionName": "0202",
                "Left": "(\"2011-02-01\")",
                "Right": "(\"2012-02-01\")"
            }
        ]
    },
    "Distribution": {
        "DistributionType": "Hash",
        "Count": 3
    },
    "TableComment": "example",
    "Properties": [
        {
            "PropertyKey": "replication_allocation",
            "PropertyValue": "tag.location.default: 1"
        }
    ]
}
CreateTable.title: Creating a Table
